list.abs: ...蝶豆小煤炱（学名：Meliola clitoriae）是属于小煤炱目小煤炱科小煤炱属的一种真菌，寄生在蝶豆属植物上。该种分布于中国、印度。cite web|url=http://www1.im.ac.cn/zhi/fungi_4/125.htm|title=蝶豆小煤炱|pub.

means.word_mean: 1. genus of tropical shrubs or vines having pinnate leaves and large axillary flowers
